about_the_game:
Are you ready to discover what is hidden beyond the ordinary?

There aren't a lot of exciting adventures in the life of a modern teenager.

But you can change that if you want to. Go camping with your friends with a night in the woods around a campfire. And when strange things start happening, the choice is yours: stay back or go on an adventure.

You will see that the world is still full of mysteries and riddles that even modern science cannot solve.

You are going to meet some extraordinary characters. Will you be able to find the right approach to them in order to continue your journey?

Is it always necessary to tell the truth? Is it always wrong to be angry? Your emotions, words and actions have an impact on the world around you. And who says there is only one right approach?

ARKA KRAYA is an adventure game in a world where magical realism meets your imagination.

We were inspired by the works of Hayao Miyazaki and tried to create a story, the main character of which will be you.

  • One story - two worlds and several endings

  • Control over the words and emotions of the characters

  • Graphic style inspired by classic American animation and Japanese anime

  • Frame-by-frame animation of characters that are brought to life by the artists hands

  • Unique soundtrack combining the sound of classical instruments and synthesized sounds

  • Find the right cat, maybe you can become a cat yourself

short_description: ARKA KRAYA is a point-and-click adventure game where you have to solve the mystery of a missing professor. Use your magic powers of words and emotions to explore the forest and discover the secrets of the abandoned temple.Choose your actions carefully, they have a big impact on the story.
